sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for safe and systematic storage of chemicals in the laboratory.
sections.scope: Applicable to storage of chemicals used in teaching and research laboratories.
procedure: Store chemicals in designated storage areas or cabinets.
Label all chemical containers clearly with name and date of receipt.
Segregate chemicals based on their compatibility.
Store flammable chemicals away from heat sources.
Ensure containers are tightly closed after use.
Maintain an updated inventory of stored chemicals.
sections.precautions: Do not store incompatible chemicals together. Handle chemical containers carefully.
